body: AI used is read from newduel.cfg regardless of which AI profile is selected.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: selecting the AI profile doesn't change the actual AI used

comments.body:
Thanks, you are right - it is using the "ai" property instead of the "AiPlayer" profile. I will get right on it.

**Labels:** -Priority-Medium Priority-High Component-UI
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body:
I have published the fix ( http://bitbucket.org/lodici/magarena/commits/e64cc2e0f30271afd135c0baff4132f7238c8b8b ). 

This also fixes the fact that AI extra life and difficulty was not being picked up either since it was still using the GeneralConfig properties which are now surplus to requirements.

**Status:** Started
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on March 11, 2014 13:05:58_

AI used is read from newduel.cfg regardless of which AI profile is selected.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=505_
